 , anywho . you may have seen me in **PFEZ** , or **UFEZ** ![](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/8724708f77575e91e95650d6660dcb58ad7998b119024bf4b5f246f11c279605/68747470733a2f2f692e706f7374696d672e63632f6e723259595046792f646f6c6c2e676966) . but both ponies are a entirely different meaning / mood. INT ![](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/a1108cb0af6c902ffd365d611196385efadb6a938c858a49a6c0b1082640cc62/68747470733a2f2f66696c65732e636174626f782e6d6f652f6763753666352e676966)  . unlike **UFEZ**, used when *uncomfortable, or unwell.* IWEC - **uncomfy.** I use it to express - " Thats my fictionkin., please stop saying / doing that.
